body: I just noticed that there's an [Integration of EasyBuild and Lmod](http://lmod.readthedocs.io/en/latest/190_Integration_of_EasyBuild_and_Lmod.html) page in the Lmod documentation. We should write one for Spack (or combine them) so we don't lose users to EasyBuild.
title: Integration of Spack and Lmod
